sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.DOCU_IDXX, /*결재문서 DOC_ID*/ A.APPR_SEQN, /*결재문서번호*/ A.COCO_SEQN, /*경조일련번호*/ A.COCO_CODE, /*경조명코드*/ A.COCO_KIND, /*경조종류*/ A.FRCW_CODE, /*가족관계*/ A.CCBS_BEDE, /*경조기준시작일*/ A.EMPL_NUMB, /*작성자사번*/ A.APLT_EMNR, /*신청대상자사번*/ A.APPL_DATE, /*신청일*/ A.COCO_DATE, /*경조일*/ A.WORK_PROD, /*재직기간*/ A.EXCC_AMOT, /*경조금액*/ A.CCIT_CODE, /*경조용품코드*/ A.COCO_RESN, /*경조사유*/ A.SLIP_LINE, /*전표라인번호 */ A.SLIP_NUMB, /*전표번호*/ A.SSPS_CODE, /*전표상태코드*/ SF_GET_COMMNAME('SSPS_CODE', A.SSPS_CODE) AS SSPS_CODE_STR, /*전표상태명*/ A.PAYX_DATE, /*지급일*/ B.EMPL_NAME AS EMP_INF1, /*사원명*/ C.SECT_NAME AS EMP_INF2, /*소속명*/ C.DEPT_NAME AS EMP_INF3, /*부서명*/ D.COMD_CDNM AS EMP_INF4, /*직급명*/ E.COMD_CDNM AS EMP_INF5, /*직위명*/ B.ENCO_DATE, /*입사일*/ X.SUBJ_NAME, /*결재문서 제목*/ X.APPR_STAT, /*결재상태*/ SF_GET_COMMNAME('APPR_STAT', X.APPR_STAT) APPR_STAT_STR, /*결재상태*/ SF_GET_COMMNAMEREF('APPR_STAT', X.APPR_STAT, '1') APPR_STAT_PROC, /*결재상태*/ X.ENDX_DATE, /*결재완료일자*/ A.INST_USID, /*입력작업자*/ A.INST_DATE, /*입력일시*/ A.UPDT_USID, /*수정작업자*/ A.UPDT_DATE, /*수정일*/ '0' CHK_BOX /*체크박스*/ FROM CW_COCOAP A /*경조금신청*/ INNER JOIN HR_MASTXM B /*인사기본*/ ON A.APLT_EMNR = B.EMPL_NUMB LEFT OUTER JOIN VI_DEPTXM C ON B.DEPT_CODE = C.DEPT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TM_CODEXD D /*직급*/ ON D.COMM_CODE = 'CPOS_CODE' AND B.CPOS_CODE = D.COMD_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TM_CODEXD E /*직위*/ ON E.COMM_CODE = 'OPOS_CODE' AND B.OPOS_CODE = E.COMD_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_APPRXH X /*결재테이블*/ ON A.DOCU_IDXX = X.DOCU_IDXX AND A.APPR_SEQN = X.APPR_SEQN
A.APPL_DATE >= #APPL_DATE1#
A.APPL_DATE <= #APPL_DATE2#
X.APPR_STAT = #APPR_STAT#
ORDER BY A.COCO_SEQN

SELECT /* WFMA0030.SEARCHSLIPNUM 전표처리된 전표번호 조회 */ SLIP_NUMB FROM CW_COCOAP A WHERE DOCU_IDXX = #DOCU_IDXX# /* 결재DOC_ID * AND APPR_SEQN = #APPR_SEQN# /* 결재일련번호 */ AND COCO_SEQN = #COCO_SEQN# /* 경조금신청SEQ */
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CW_COCOAP /* WFMA0030.UPDATE02 전표대상데이터 체크 초기화 */ SET SLIP_NUMB = '', PAYX_DATE = '' WHERE SLIP_NUMB = #FORM_IDXX# || #UPDT_USID#

UPDATE CW_COCOAP /* WFMA0030.UPDATE03 전표대상데이터 체크 UPDATE */ SET SLIP_NUMB = #FORM_IDXX# || #UPDT_USID#, PAYX_DATE = #PAYX_DATE# WHERE DOCU_IDXX = #DOCU_IDXX# /* 결재 DOC_ID */ AND APPR_SEQN = #APPR_SEQN# /* 결재일련번호 */ AND COCO_SEQN = #COCO_SEQN# /* 경조금신청SEQ */
